title: Machine Learning
description: a branch of artificial intelligence that enables algorithms to uncover hidden patterns within datasets, allowing them to make predictions on new, similar data without explicit programming for each task

title: Cyber Security
description: The practice of protecting systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks.

title: IOT
description: The Internet of Things (IoT) refers to a network of physical devices, vehicles, appliances, and other physical objects that are embedded with sensors, software, and network connectivity, allowing them to collect and share data.
